sentences.en: a book about modern history
sentences.cn: 一本关于现代史的书

sentences.en: A lot of progress has been made with the use of modern technology .
sentences.cn: 现代科技的应用带来了很大的进步。

sentences.en: Computers are an essential part of modern life .
sentences.cn: 电脑是现代生活必不可少的组成部分。

sentences.en: Divorce is a permanent, ineradicable fact of modern life.
sentences.cn: 离婚在现代生活中一直存在、无法改变。

sentences.en: He remains a towering figure in modern British politics.
sentences.cn: 他在现代英国政坛上一直是位杰出的人物。

sentences.en: He was one of the most influential perfor-mers of modern jazz.
sentences.cn: 他是现代爵士乐最有影响力的表演者之一。

sentences.en: In many ways, it was a very modern school for its time.
sentences.cn: 从很多方面来说，这所学校在当时是非常先进的。

sentences.en: Modern tennis rackets are now apparently 20 per cent lighter.
sentences.cn: 现代的网球拍据说比以前的轻20%。

sentences.en: Most modern housing estates are terrible and inevitably done on the cheap.
sentences.cn: 现在的房子大多质量差劲透顶，肯定都是偷工减料盖起来的。

sentences.en: Only the names are ancient; the characters are modern and contemporary.
sentences.cn: 只有姓名是古代的；人物都是现代的、摩登的。

sentences.en: She saw herself as a direct, no-nonsense modern woman.
sentences.cn: 她认为自己是个直截了当、不拖泥带水的现代女性。

sentences.en: Smaller families are a feature of modern society .
sentences.cn: 家庭规模变小是现代社会的一个特征。

sentences.en: Such companies must change if they are to compete in the modern world .
sentences.cn: 此类公司如果想在现代社会中与别人竞争，就必须有所改变。

sentences.en: The car neatly blends classic styling into a smooth modern package.
sentences.cn: 这款汽车巧妙地将经典式样融入到流线型的现代设计中。

sentences.en: The Leisure Center is a long and low modern building.
sentences.cn: 休闲中心是一座狭长而低矮的现代建筑。

sentences.en: The original supermarkets were small by modern standards.
sentences.cn: 最初的超级市场按现代的标准来看是很小的。

sentences.en: The telephone is one of the great tyrannies of modern life.
sentences.cn: 电话是现代生活中让人最反感的必需品之一。

sentences.en: They are the youngest children in modern times to face murder charges.
sentences.cn: 他们是近代面临谋杀指控儿童中年龄最小的。

sentences.en: This boxed collection captures 64 of the greatest modern love songs.
sentences.cn: 这套盒装专辑收录了64首最好听的当代爱情歌曲。

sentences.en: Van Gogh had a major influence on the development of modern painting.
sentences.cn: 凡·高对现代绘画的发展有着重大影响。

sentences.en: We are in one of the most severe recessions in modern times.
sentences.cn: 我们正在经历现代最严重的一段经济衰退。

sentences.en: You can also tour the site on modern coaches equipped with videos.
sentences.cn: 您也可以乘坐配有视频设备的现代化长途汽车游览那处遗址。
